tasks.label: uv: run matching_llm
tasks.command: env PYTHONPATH="${workspaceFolder}" uv run python -m src.matching.matching_llm

tasks.label: uv: debug matching_llm
tasks.command: env PYTHONPATH="${workspaceFolder}" uv run python -m debugpy --listen 5678 --wait-for-client -m src.matching.matching_llm
